title: -XBT- ORIGINAL EXE Nexus Mod Manager - Skyrim, Oblivion, Fallout
description:

NOW YOU CAN'T DOWNLOAD THE MOD MANAGER BECAUSE YOU HAVE TO LOGIN TO DOWNLOAD?

HOORAY FOR THE GREAT VICTORY OVER THE NEXUS MODS SITE!! LET'S CONTINUE TO DEFY THE SELF-DECLARED NEXUS LORDS AND REMOVE THEM FROM THEIR FALSE THRONE!!! LET'S FORCE THEM TO SUBMIT TO US FURTHER!!!

This is the 0.52.1 version of the Nexus Mod Manager in September 20 of 2014.

FOLLOW THESE INSTRUCTIONS EXACTLY, AND IN ORDER.

=======================================================

STEP 1:
	a) For versions 0.50.0 and newer, .Net Framework 4.5 installation is required to run it.
	b) If you don't already have net framework 4.5, then download from the microsoft site here:
 <a href="	http://www.microsoft.com/en-US/download/details.aspx?id=8483" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">	http://www.microsoft.com/en-US/download/details.aspx?id=8483</a>
		or if you have Windows 7 or XP you can just use the files I already included in the "Net Framework 4.5" folder.

STEP 2:
These are the original .exe files, so just install like normal.

STEP 3:
When you finished installing, run the app and choose OFFLINE MODE if you don't want to go through the Nexus serevrs or if you are banned or don't want to create a login.

=======================================================

NOTES:

How do I crack the program?
	No longer needed! We defeated the Nexus and now they submitted and you don't have to login to use!
	
Can I update mods? 
	YES. Just not through the Mod Manager if in OFFLINE MODE.
	If you do have a login, it will work!

Can I update the Mod Manager? 
	Yes!

Will it ever try to access the Nexus Forums? 
	Not if you're in OFFLINE MODE!

Do I have to disconnect from the internet?
	Nope!

Where do my new mods go?
	Put your new mods in C:GamesSkyrimmods (or GamesYOUR_GAME_HEREmods
	You can also change the directory in Settings.

How do I download mods?
	Download through ThePirateBay.se or through H33T, or if you want the latest versions, either check my torrents to find the latest updates, or download from a friend's computer then copy to your computer.
